article.Heading: Budget 2017: Agri sector's woes and hopes
article.Summary: Watch Anil Gupta, Professor at IIM Ahmedabad in an interview with Manisha Gupta. He speaks about the agricultural sector and shares his views and wish-list from the Budget.
article.Body: Watch Anil Gupta, Professor at IIM Ahmedabad in an interview with Manisha Gupta. He speaks about the agricultural sector and shares his views and wish-list from the Budget.
